description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 5 iterations of function f(x) = 3x + 8.
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..25000000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(3*n+8) and IsPrime(9*n+32) and IsPrime(27*n+104) and IsPrime(81*n+320) and IsPrime(243*n+968)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
